title: Light grey slammed 11 window Double Door..

posts.content:
ok genuine sale here, I have had this bus over 1 year now and just really finished it and fancy a change.
Its a 66 and I have fabricated it to look like an older model- and it was originally a panel van so its came a long way !

4 inch narrowed beam
dropped spindles
slam shocks
autocraft tubs
steering box raise
IRS rear
adjustable spring plates
uprated gearbox
new 1600 twin carb engine
all ancillaries new
creative engineering front safari windows
ratty rear safari
side popouts, also 4 others to completely have all popout windows
new ragtop fitted
front bench seat fits over tubs perfectly
volkswares full width rock and roll bed
loud motad motorbike exhaust
15 inch mint steels with s/s hubcaps
empi shifter fitted
drives fine with no issues.
nice paintwork but does have a few imperfections here and there.

both sets of cargo doors could line up better also the drivers door, some interior trimming to finish, my next plan was to have the engine out and paint the engine bay I have the paint which will be included and when the engine was out I would fit a nice vintage speed exhaust, and adjust the front bumper so it sits better !!

overall a very nice looking splitscreen that is ready to use and I have saved little things for the next owner to do, as lets face it they all need something.

oh and when I built up the cab door frames I forgot to fit the quarter light catches, so that's another job for the new owner to do ( sorry lol ).parts supplied.and I would paint the tinware black !

I have a new set of ribbed bumpers ( no brackets ) which will come with the bus and I will have lots of various spares aswell which will be included.

any questions as I have prob missed loads please pick up the phone and call me and I will be happy to answer your questions, located in CENTRAL SCOTLAND.
NO OFFERS, NO SWAPS , NO PX.
Lots of new parts recently fitted.
Full mot with no advisories.
Â£16500 priced to sell !
Some pictures on Colin's behalf
Looks Great Colin... Are you friends with Coco??

Have you still got the square?

Colin.

hey guys,

as far as I know, double doors are pretty rare.

In an auto museum in the usa, there is one (will contact on of my friends to know where exactly)

anybody has an idea of the number of how many splits where made with double doors on both sides ?

Hi,

Nice looking bus. Is it left or right hand drive?

Thanks,

M

Mk1-17 wrote:
hey guys,

as far as I know, double doors are pretty rare.

In an auto museum in the usa, there is one (will contact on of my friends to know where exactly)

anybody has an idea of the number of how many splits where made with double doors on both sides ?


Pre 1955 barndoor era buses are rare as doubledoors, There are only 6 known in RHD and about 30 in LHD.

From 1955 to 1967 there are thousands of doubledoors out there.




Good luck with the sale Colin its a good asking price
